import React, { Component } from "react"; class Contact extends Component { render() { if (!this.props.data) return null; const name = this.props.data.contact_name; const street = this.props.data.address.street; const city = this.props.data.address.city; const state = this.props.data.address.state; const zip = this.props.data.address.zip; const phone = this.props.data.phone; const email = this.props.data.email; const message = this.props.data.contactmessage; return (
